text.text_translated:
It is good to know about different cultures. A `culture` is the way people in a place live and think. This knowledge helps us avoid problems when we talk. But we must be careful with this knowledge. We should keep it in the back of our minds. We must not use it to make stereotypes. A `stereotype` is a simple idea about a group of people. These ideas are often wrong. Stereotypes can break good business relationships.

A country's `culture` is important. But many other things also make a person. Their region is important. Their groups are important. Their age is important. If they are a man or a woman is also important. Their company and their own life are important too.

So, we should remember these differences. But we must not think all people from a country are the same. We must see every person as an individual.

best_attempt.text_translated:
It is good to know about cultural differences. People from different places can act and think differently. A `culture` is the way people in a place live and think. This knowledge helps us understand people better. It helps us avoid problems in business. But we must be careful. We must not use `stereotypes`. A `stereotype` is a simple idea about a group of people. This idea is often not true. These ideas make it hard to build good business relationships.

A country's culture is important. But many other things also shape a person. The part of the country we come from is important. The groups we are part of are important. Our age is important. It is also important if a person is a man or a woman. The culture of our company is important. Our own life experiences are important too.

So, we should remember this knowledge about culture. But we must not use it to think we know what a person is like. We must not think all people from a country are the same. We must see each person as one person.
